author: breser
msg: STATUS: Adding r8272 and r8295 as 1.0.0 candidates.

author: sussman
msg: More book cleanup.
* ch06.xml (basic apache configuration):  add warning about common 301
error scenario.
* ch07.xml (config):  document [tunnels] section by adding xref to ssh
section of chapter 6.
* TODO:  make to-do's to-done.

author: breser
msg: STATUS: Add r8698 as 1.0.0 candidate.

author: breser
msg: Fix svn_repos_dir_delta() in python bindings to work.  This still doesn't
give us authz support.  But it makes it work.
* subversion/bindings/swig/svn_repos.i
Ignore the authz_read_func and authz_read_baton arguments to
svn_repos_dir_delta.

author: sussman
msg: Filling up more holes in the book's coverage.
* ch04.xml (Repository Layout):  don't even mention the idea of laying
out a repository indexed by branch.  Make a xref to cmpilato's stuff
about 'project roots'.
(Best Practices):  split into 2 sections about manual merge-tracking
and using --dry-run to preview merges.
(Working with your branch):  make a quick forward xref to 'svn
switch' section.
* ch07.xml (servers):  document all the ssl- variables in 'servers' file.
(miscellany): add missing varlistentry tag to autoprops
section.  Document "log-encoding' and 'use-commit-times' variables.
